meanings.definition: A type of antiretroviral drug used to treat HIV.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed indinavirs to help manage the HIV infection.
meanings.sent2: Many patients rely on indinavirs to control the progression of the virus.
meanings.sent3: The indinavirs danced into the bloodstream, ready to fight off the virus.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny warriors, the indinavirs battled against the HIV invaders.
meanings.sent5: The indinavirs acted as shields, protecting the body from the harmful effects of HIV.
